byline.contributor: Christina Capecchi reported from St. Paul, and Mitch Smith from Chicago.
byline.original: By CHRISTINA CAPECCHI and MITCH SMITH

abstract: Prosecutors in Ramsey County, Minn, charge Police Officer Jeronimo Yanez with second-degree manslaughter and two felony counts of intentional discharge of dangerous weapon; Yanez killed Philando Castile during July traffic stop in Falcon Heights; police shooting of black victim sparked public outcry.
lead_paragraph: Officer Jeronimo Yanez shot Mr. Castile after pulling him over in Falcon Heights, Minn. The aftermath was streamed on Facebook Live by Mr. Castile’s girlfriend.
snippet: Officer Jeronimo Yanez shot Mr. Castile after pulling him over in Falcon Heights, Minn. The aftermath was streamed on Facebook Live by Mr. Castile’s girlfriend....

headline.main: Officer Who Shot Philando Castile Is Charged With Manslaughter
headline.print_headline: Officer Who Shot Black Driver Is Charged With Manslaughter
